attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
disgusted about the way elderly are treated. I.m from your constituency in Kirkcaldy and would like to believe in you enough to reply.You send a calendat to support you . Well let,s support our elderly. Hope to hear back.
                     Yours totally disallusined. K. Munro

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
